#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
using namespace std ;
long long int a[1000002];
int mod = 1000000007 ;
int main(){

  //  cout << "vikram" << endl ;
    a[1]=1;
    a[2]=0;
    for(int i=3;i<=1000001;i++){
        a[i]=((a[i-1])%mod+(a[i-2])%mod)%mod;
    }
  //cout << "vikram"  << endl ;
    int t ; cin >> t ;
    while(t--){
        int x , y , r ; cin >>x>>y>>r ;
        cout << ((x*(a[r]))%mod+(y*(a[r+1]))%mod)%mod << endl ; ;
    }
    return  0 ;
}
